content.en: IVF success optimization: Scientists are using algorithms to improve the success rates of in vitro fertilization (IVF). These algorithms are being used to evaluate embryo morphology, track embryo development, predict blastocyst development, select chromosomally normal embryos, and identify embryos with low implantation potential. By using these algorithms, researchers hope to improve the chances of selecting embryos that are most likely to result in a successful pregnancy and live birth.
content.da: Optimering af IVF-succes: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at forbedre succesraterne for in vitro fertilisering (IVF). Disse algoritmer bruges til at evaluere embryo morfologi, spore embryo udvikling, forudsige blastocystudvikling, udvælge kromosomalt normale embryoer og identificere embryoer med lav implantationsevne. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskerne at forbedre chancerne for at udvælge embryoer, der har størst sandsynlighed for at resultere i en vellykket graviditet og levende fødsel.
